import React from 'react' import { Card, Button, Icon } from 'antd' import './index.less' import '../ui.less' export default class Buttons extends React.Component { state = { loading: true } // 关闭按钮 切换loading状态 handleCloseLoading = () => { this.setState({ loading: !this.state.loading }) } render() { return (
) } }
